title: URF CHALLENGE: Rioters VS Players. Friday 22/4 @6PM PST.
body:
You think URF is your ally? You merely adopted the URF.. Our team was _**born**_ in it.. molded by it. We didn't see regular CDR until we were already Ultra Rapid.. but then it was nothing to us but blinding.

**Who:** RGM team Rioters VS players
**When:** Friday 22/4 @6PM PST.
**Where:** NA server.

**Rioters:**
L4T3NCY
Riot Stephiroth
Ponts
Riot Bearricade
Riot Terra
Rayven
Riot MoreChrono
O2ymandias

We'll setup custom game rooms and edit the name/pwd into this thread around 6. >o</

http://i.imgur.com/0vGhzFu.png

Room #1: Riot URF Challenge 01
PWD: willyoutryhard?
Rioters: L4T3NCY, Riot Karsa, Riot Vitzkrieg, Riot Terra, Riot Socrates

Room #1: Riot URF Challenge 02
PWD: willyoutryhard?
Rioters: Ponts, Riot MoreChrono, Stephiroth, Kitae

BOTH FULL. Game 2 coming afterwards!

Room #1: Riot URF Challenge 03
PWD: willyoutryhard?
Rioters: L4T3NCY, Riot Vitzkrieg, Riot Terra

Room #1: Riot URF Challenge 04
PWD: willyoutryhard?
Rioters: Ponts, Riot MoreChrono, Stephiroth, Kitae

GG Thanks for playing everyone! (even ppl in their Dimaond promos who accidently landed in our games! :P) Confirmed Singed is totally fine in URF. Definitely a great strategic choice. :3

replies.body: I won't be around for this sadly, but as usual for whomever ends up being on L4T3NCY's team please do him a huge favour and pick Bard, he really likes it when Bard is on his team.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/131/399/fry.PNG
http://i.imgur.com/e1mVAlm.png
OOOOOOOOOOOTAY~

My gf's name is Steph...Steph Roth.

I never knew you worked for rito stephanie.
...I went to high school and college with someone named Stephanie Roth.  I don't suppose your GF went to school at Michigan?

Let's just say that if she did, she wouldn't be my girlfriend.

O-H! \#GoBucks \#muckfishigan
LOL, too perfect
Dang. Execution on this was too good.
That plot twist if that is verified.
Do not fear the Bard.
There should be a Bard on both teams, and a Tahm Kench on L4T3NCY's team. The Bards can alternate Ults, and Tahm can eat him in between. This way he'll always be safe. :)

Sorry bro, no Kench.

#alwaysbenchkench
http://pre08.deviantart.net/2cef/th/pre/i/2015/291/4/4/rare_pepe_kench_by_bekek-d9dkrhu.jpg

The void of despair in my soul, that it filled up instantly is overwhelming.
{{item:3070}}
The pool runs deeper than 6 here. :P

I don't think it does though. :0

Source: We playtest every day.
And I roll those 6 x B-tier everyday coz of the {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} when rolling A-tier and S-tier. :P
So I just played a game as Ali... Zed and Fizz were nightmares. How do you counter those jerks??
It will never be deep enough. {{champion:44}}

WHAT TIME IS 6 PST IN THE MIDWEST

*PANIC*

It's 8 o'clock man, geez use google

There is a reason you're a silver pleb

Oh thanks!

I comment on my own posts too because im lonely
Ouch.

*flips hair*
*snaps fingers*
You about to get served!

Damn, a person with broken fingers is about to defeat Rioters in a game of _URF_.

That's hardcore.

This is the day you'll regret making fizz. {{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}{{champion:105}}

That's why I play Ori :D
Man. What I wouldn't give to be good at Ori. Maybe Urf is the place to give it a try!

Never a better place or time to get used to commanding the ball, imo.

Considering how much you'll be spamming QWE :3
welp. I am trying it this game!
It would be cool if you guys could stream it, on the leaguecommunity stream perhaps.
